tool.name: Recount
tool.description: Get rna-seq count data with R recount Package
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool fetches RNA-seq count data directly from Recount project based on the recount bioconductor R package. Given an ID, it returns a small report containing the metadata of the experiment. Il also generates one count file per sample.
**Results**
- Tabular file containing meta-data - One count file per sample
